aboutSection.headline: About Pixel Trail Development
aboutSection.description: At Pixel Trail Development, our mission is to empower professionals and businesses with visually stunning, high-performance websites. We use technologies, such as React, Netlify and AWS to craft custom solutions tailored to your unique needs. We believe in building long-term relationships with our clients, offering continuous support and maintenance to ensure your online presence remains robust and up-to-date. From ideation to deployment, we guide you through every step of the website creation journey, pixel-by-pixel.

members.name: Ethan Luxton
members.description: "From javascript bootcamp to business owner". With many years experience in customer service, finance and software development, rest assured all the needs of your project will be met from every angle.

faqs.question: What services do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer full service web development and hosting using technologies like React, Netlify, and AWS, tailored to your unique needs. We additionally offer full-service consulting on current web and software implementations for businesses and individual projects.

faqs.question: Do you build websites on Wordpress, Squarespace or WIX?
faqs.answer: Currently, we do not offer Wordpress, Squarespace or WIX website building services.

faqs.question: Can I bring my own domain?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can bring your own domain. We will assist with migrating the domain to our provider to host the site.

faqs.question: Do you give any discounts?
faqs.answer: Veterans, individuals with disabilities and non-profit foundations qualify for a 20% discount on initial and any ongoing fees. Verification is required. Subject to changes at the discretion of Pixel Trail Development, LLC.

faqs.question: Do you provide any services outside of Washington State
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, at this time we only service clients in Washington State. This is subject to change at any time.

servicesSection.headline:
Build your next idea
even faster.
servicesSection.sectionDescription:
At Pixel Trail Development, we craft visually-stunning websites using React, seamlessly deployed via Netlify.

Our custom-built solutions are for helping professionals and businesses in Washington State to navigate the internet trail, pixel-by-pixel.

templates.name: Ideation Stage
templates.description: At this stage, we are just getting started with laying all ideas on the table. Building a solid foundation which is required for all websites.

templates.name: Framework Stage
templates.description: Here we have a working framework, it is a rough outline, but represents a solid base and can be refactored to look professional.

templates.name: Refactoring Stage
templates.description: Here we make your new website look professional and ready for clients. Putting the finishing touches on products, styles and the overall site.

templates.name: Production Stage
templates.description: This stage is the launch of your new website! From here on, Pixel Trail Development will host and maintain your website so you don't have to.

plans.title: Pixel Consultation
plans.description: For businesses and individuals looking to enhance their digital presence
features: Full-service web consulting package and presentation
Ongoing recommendations and support on a pro-rata basis

plans.title: Pixel Total Web Package
plans.description: For those wanting to establish a new business, build a hobby or strengthen their online presence
features: Bring your domain or setup a new domain
Websites and backends built from the ground up, highly customizable and fully serviced

commonFeatures: Initial 60-minute meeting to discuss your business or individual needs, completely free and no obligations required.
The Pixel Total Web Package includes on-request updates to content, shops, information color schemes and typography.
Regular security checks and patching for all available integrations.
Encrypted data storage on a on-site server.

Veterans, individuals with disabilities and non-profit foundations qualify for a 20% discount on initial and any ongoing fees. Verification is required. Subject to changes at the discretion of Pixel Trail Development, LLC.
